info.name: Companion theme violet
info.description:
Changes the default style of the runescape companion app(webpage version only).
URLs matching the regex: "https://secure.runescape.com/(?=.*?\/comapp).*"
How it looks: https://imgur.com/a/Eejh2
Any suggestions or fixes? Email me aria.pakur@gmail.com
info.additionalInfo: If the theme doesn't apply, then check your URLs matching the regexp text.
